name: Battlesnake Performance
description:
A dashboard that provides some helpful insights into your Battlesnake's performance. Includes helpful charts for viewing performance metrics like how many turns your snake lasts, how long it gets in each game, the competitors you have gone up against, and how your snake died. 

**Important**: For this dashboard to work, you will need to add custom attributes to the New Relic agent. See the [related blog post](https://newrelic.com/blog/search?s=battlesnake) for instructions.
